strings:
<voice_0x01001480><se_low>King Trode: Oops! Someone's coming!
We must hide!
<voice_0x01001481><se_def>Marcello: You wanted to see me, Your Holiness?
<voice_0x01001482><se_low>Lord High Priest: This place is far removed from the secular world...
<voice_0x01001483><se_def>Marcello: I understand. I will see that the Templars take charge of Your Holiness's security.
<voice_0x01001484><se_low>Lord High Priest: ...But rumours know no bounds, Marcello.
<voice_0x01001485><se_low>Lord High Priest: I hear your name among the whisperings. There are disturbing allegations surrounding you.
<voice_0x01001486><se_low>Lord High Priest: And I fear they may be more than mere rumours.
<voice_0x01001487><se_def>Marcello: It is sad that the talented should always be the victims of envy, Your Holiness. Surely you don't believe thes<endash>

<voice_0x01001488><se_low>Lord High Priest: Abbot Francisco was very dear to me.
My one true friend. We were very close.
<voice_0x01001489><se_low>Lord High Priest: I am employing you as master of my guard for a very good reason. For Francisco.

<voice_0x0100148A><se_low>Lord High Priest: When you were abandoned by your parents,
he raised you in the abbey as if you were his own son.
<voice_0x0100148B><se_low>Lord High Priest: The least I can do for him is to keep a close eye on you. To stop you straying any further from the fold.
<voice_0x0100148C><se_low>Lord High Priest: Marcello. You are intelligent and competent. You have clearly demonstrated that in your command of the Templars.

<voice_0x0100148D><se_low>Lord High Priest: Can you not satisfy yourself with that?
If you persist with your current duplicity,
I will have no choice but to discipline you.
<voice_0x0100148E><se_low>Lord High Priest: But I am not so unjust as to think it's only you. The church is riddled with corruption and bribery. I suppose I am largely to blame for being too lenient.
<voice_0x0100148F><se_low>Lord High Priest: Now let that be the end of this discussion.
<voice_0x01001490><se_low>Lord High Priest: Underneath this o'erleaping ambition, you have a good soul. There is still time for you to mend your ways.

<voice_0x01001491><se_def>Marcello: ...Thank you, Your Holiness.
May the Goddess be with you always.

<voice_0x01001492><se_low>Lord High Priest: Ah, Francisco, my old friend... I should have known the book of his conscience would be closed to me. Guide his straying soul...
lest he lose it.
